content.p: The portfolio of degrees offered by the Business School offer a highly flexible undergraduate and postgraduate learning environment, with courses designed to cater for a variety of different student interests and career aspirations. Cutting-edge research from across the Business School underpins the academic rigour and business relevance of all of its teaching. The development of professional and transferable skills is also a feature in of every module in order to ensure that graduates continue to be well-placed in the job market. Learn more about the Business School's undergraduate degree programmes. The Business School offers a range of specialised Master of Science programmes. The Nottingham MBA is highly valued by corporations worldwide as an ideal preparation for senior positions in public and private sectors. The Business School welcomes applications from suitably qualified students to undertake research leading to a doctoral degree. Through our Executive Education arm, we work with organisations to motivate, retain and develop their human capital in a changing economic environment. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
